Airport Terminal 1.name: Airport Terminal 1
Airport Terminal 1.summary: Stepford Airport Terminal 1 (also known as Terminal 1 ) is an underground through station in the Airport Zone .

Airport Terminal 2.name: Airport Terminal 2
Airport Terminal 2.summary: Stepford Airport Terminal 2 (also known as Terminal 2 ) is a terminus past Stepford Airport Central , trains will also turn around here to Terminal 3 . It is served by Stepford Connect services to Stepford Victoria and St Helens Bridge ; Waterline services to Newry ; AirLink services to Stepford Central , Airport Terminal 3 and Leighton Stepford Road ; and AirLink Shuttle services to Stepford Airport Parkway .
Airport Terminal 2.accessibility: Step-free access via lifts and ramps

Airport Terminal 3.name: Airport Terminal 3
Airport Terminal 3.summary: Stepford Airport Terminal 3 (also known as Terminal 3 ) is a stub station in the Airport Zone .
Airport Terminal 3.accessibility: Step-free access via lifts and ramps

Airport West.name: Airport West
Airport West.summary: Stepford Airport West (also known as Airport West ) is a through station on the Esterfield Branch .

Angel Pass.name: Angel Pass
Angel Pass.summary: Angel Pass is a through station on the Stepford Main Line .

Ashlan Park.name: Ashlan Park
Ashlan Park.summary: Ashlan Park is a through station on the Connolly Branch .

Aslockby.name: Aslockby
Aslockby.summary: Aslockby is a through station on the Rayleigh Bay Branch .

Barton.name: Barton
Barton.summary: Barton is a terminus located on the Barton Branch that was added in Version 2.2 .

Beaulieu Park.name: Beaulieu Park
Beaulieu Park.summary: Beaulieu Park (pronounced as Byoo-lee Park ) is a through station that opened as part of Version 1.1 with the Stepford Connect extension to Morganstown . This station serves Metro services to Beechley , Stepford Central , St Helens Bridge and Morganstown .
Beaulieu Park.accessibility: Level access & step-free access via lifts

Beechley.name: Beechley
Beechley.summary: Beechley is a through station and a terminus on the Willowfield Branch . It is served by Stepford Connect services to Willowfield , Whitefield , Port Benton , Stepford Airport Central , Westwyvern and Llyn-by-the-Sea ; and Metro services to Willowfield , Stepford Victoria , Stepford United Football Club , Barton , Berrily , and Morganstown .

Benton.name: Benton
Benton.summary: Benton is a major through station and terminus on the Stepford Main Line .

Benton Bridge (Station).name: Benton Bridge (Station)
Benton Bridge (Station).summary: Benton Bridge is a through station on the Stepford Main Line , with services continuing to Hampton Hargate or the Airport Branch .

Berrily.name: Berrily
Berrily.summary: Berrily is a through station and terminus that opened as part of Version 1.1 along the Stepford Connect extension to Morganstown .

Bodin.name: Bodin
Bodin.summary: Bodin is a through station on the Stepford Main Line .

Cambridge Street Parkway.name: Cambridge Street Parkway
Cambridge Street Parkway.summary: Cambridge Street Parkway is a through station located on the Connolly and Esterfield Branches .

Carnalea Bridge.name: Carnalea Bridge
Carnalea Bridge.summary: Carnalea Bridge is a bi-directional through station on the Rayleigh Bay Branch .

City Hospital.name: City Hospital
City Hospital.summary: City Hospital is an elevated through station located at the end of the Stepford Victoria and Willowfield Branches.

Connolly.name: Connolly
Connolly.summary: Connolly is the terminus of the Connolly Branch , located on the banks of the River Ben .

Coxly.name: Coxly
Coxly.summary: Coxly is a through station on the Stepford Main Line .

Coxly Newtown.name: Coxly Newtown
Coxly Newtown.summary: Coxly Newtown is a through station on the Barton Branch .
Coxly Newtown.accessibility: Step-free access via lifts at south entrance

East Berrily.name: East Berrily
East Berrily.summary: East Berrily is a through station that opened as part of Version 1.1 for the Stepford Connect extension to Morganstown . It is served by Metro services to Beechley , Stepford Central , St Helens Bridge and Morganstown . This station received a major upgrade in Version 1.7 .

Eden Quay.name: Eden Quay
Eden Quay.summary: Eden Quay is a through station located on the Newry Branch . It is served by Waterline services to Newry Harbour , Newry , Connolly , Airport Terminal 2 , Farleigh , Esterfield , Morganstown and Greenslade ; and limited Stepford Express services to Newry and Leighton City .
Eden Quay.accessibility: Step-free access via ramp to Platform 2 only

Edgemead.name: Edgemead
Edgemead.summary: Edgemead is a through station and a bi-directional terminus on the Stepford Main Line served by Stepford Connect and Stepford Express .
Edgemead.accessibility: Level access & step-free access via lifts

Elsemere Junction.name: Elsemere Junction
Elsemere Junction.summary: Elsemere Junction is a through station on the Morganstown Branch that was added in Version 1.1 .

Elsemere Pond.name: Elsemere Pond
Elsemere Pond.summary: Elsemere Pond is a through station on the Morganstown Branch . It is served by Metro services to Willowfield , Beechley , Stepford Victoria , Stepford Central , St Helens Bridge , Berrily , Morganstown and Barton .

Esterfield.name: Esterfield
Esterfield.summary: Esterfield is a terminus on the Esterfield Branch .

Faraday Road.name: Faraday Road
Faraday Road.summary: Faraday Road is a through station on the Newry Branch .

Farleigh.name: Farleigh
Farleigh.summary: Farleigh (pronounced as Far-lee ) is a through station and minor terminus on the Esterfield Branch .

Faymere.name: Faymere
Faymere.summary: Faymere is a through station on the Stepford Main Line and the first station along the Llyn extension, introduced in Version 1.4 .

Financial Quarter.name: Financial Quarter
Financial Quarter.summary: Financial Quarter is an elevated through station on the Stepford Victoria Branch .
Financial Quarter.accessibility: Step-free access via lifts (west side entrance only)

Four Ways.name: Four Ways
Four Ways.summary: Four Ways is a through station located in the Metro Core Section . It is located near the Stepford Connect Headquarters between Stepford Central and Stepford East .

Greenslade.name: Greenslade
Greenslade.summary: Greenslade is the terminus of the Greenslade Branch .

Hampton Hargate.name: Hampton Hargate
Hampton Hargate.summary: Hampton Hargate is a through station on the Stepford Main Line .

Hemdon Park.name: Hemdon Park
Hemdon Park.summary: Hemdon Park is a small through station located along the Willowfield Branch . Metro services to Willowfield , Stepford Victoria , Stepford United Football Club , Berrily and Barton call here.

Houghton Rake.name: Houghton Rake
Houghton Rake.summary: Houghton Rake is a limited-service through station along the Whitefield Branch .

James Street.name: James Street
James Street.summary: James Street is an underground limited-service through station on the Esterfield Branch .

Leighton City.name: Leighton City
Leighton City.summary: Leighton City is a major through station and terminus located at the southern end of the former Leighton Zone .

Leighton Stepford Road.name: Leighton Stepford Road
Leighton Stepford Road.summary: Leighton Stepford Road , located in the centre of the former Leighton Zone , is a major through station and terminus on the Stepford Main Line .

Leighton West.name: Leighton West
Leighton West.summary: Leighton West is a small terminus on the Leighton West Branch , located between Leighton City and Edgemead .

Llyn-by-the-Sea.name: Llyn-by-the-Sea
Llyn-by-the-Sea.summary: Llyn-by-the-Sea , or simply known as Llyn , is the major southern terminus of the Stepford Main Line . This station is managed by National Rail .

Millcastle.name: Millcastle
Millcastle.summary: Millcastle is a through station on the Stepford Main Line that opened in Version 1.4 .

Millcastle Racecourse.name: Millcastle Racecourse
Millcastle Racecourse.summary: Millcastle Racecourse is a limited-service through station on the Stepford Main Line near Millcastle .

Morganstown.name: Morganstown
Morganstown.summary: Morganstown is a major through station and terminus that opened as part of Version 1.1 along with the Stepford Connect extension. Located at the end of the Morganstown Branch , this station serves Stepford Connect services to Stepford Central ; Metro services to Beechley , Stepford Victoria , Stepford Central and St Helens Bridge ; Waterline services to Newry Harbour and Benton ; AirLink services to Stepford Central , Airport Terminal 2 and Airport Terminal 3 ; and Stepford Express services to Stepford Central , Newry , Benton , Westwyvern and Llyn-by-the-Sea .

Morganstown Docks.name: Morganstown Docks
Morganstown Docks.summary: Morganstown Docks is a through station served by Waterline services to Newry Harbour , Newry , Benton , Morganstown and Greenslade ; and limited Metro services to Stepford Victoria and Morganstown .

New Harrow.name: New Harrow
New Harrow.summary: New Harrow is a through station on the Morganstown Branch that serves Metro services to Willowfield , Beechley , Stepford Victoria , Stepford Central , St Helens Bridge , Berrily , Morganstown and Barton .

Newry.name: Newry
Newry.summary: Newry is a terminus and through station on the Newry Branch .
Newry.accessibility: Level access & step-free access via lifts
Newry.ticket_machines: Yes & ticket office available at east entrance

Newry Harbour.name: Newry Harbour
Newry Harbour.summary: Newry Harbour is a limited-service diesel-only terminus at the end of the Newry Branch .

Northshore.name: Northshore
Northshore.summary: Northshore is an elevated through station on the Stepford Main Line .

Port Benton.name: Port Benton
Port Benton.summary: Port Benton is a station on the Greenslade Branch .

Rayleigh Bay.name: Rayleigh Bay
Rayleigh Bay.summary: Rayleigh Bay is the terminus of the Rayleigh Bay Branch .

Rocket Parade.name: Rocket Parade
Rocket Parade.summary: Rocket Parade is a through station located on the Stepford Main Line .

Rosedale Village.name: Rosedale Village
Rosedale Village.summary: Rosedale Village is a limited-service through station on the Esterfield Branch .
Rosedale Village.accessibility: Level access & step-free access via ramp

St Helens Bridge.name: St Helens Bridge
St Helens Bridge.summary: St Helens Bridge (pronounced as Saint Helens Bridge ) is an elevated major through station located on the Stepford Main Line .

Starryloch.name: Starryloch
Starryloch.summary: Starryloch is a limited-service through station on the Stepford Main Line .

Stepford Airport Central.name: Stepford Airport Central
Stepford Airport Central.summary: Stepford Airport Central (commonly known as Airport Central ) is a major terminus located in the Airport Zone , with through services to the airport terminals. It is served by Stepford Connect services to Beechley , Stepford Victoria , Stepford Central , St Helens Bridge and Airport Terminal 2 ; AirLink services to Stepford Central , Airport Terminal 2 , Airport Terminal 3 and Leighton Stepford Road ; and AirLink Shuttle services to Stepford Airport Parkway and Airport Terminal 2 .

Stepford Airport Parkway.name: Stepford Airport Parkway
Stepford Airport Parkway.summary: Stepford Airport Parkway (commonly known as Airport Parkway ) is a through station located on the Airport Branch . Additionally, it is also a terminus for the AirLink Shuttle .

Stepford Central.name: Stepford Central
Stepford Central.summary: Stepford Central , formerly known as Stepford Town , is the major northern terminus of the Stepford Main Line , as well as a through station for services serving the Stepford Victoria Branch and Willowfield Branch .

Stepford East.name: Stepford East
Stepford East.summary: Stepford East is an elevated major through station on the Stepford Main Line .

Stepford High Street.name: Stepford High Street
Stepford High Street.summary: Stepford High Street (colloquially called High Street ) is a through station located in the Metro Core Section . It is named after the street the station is located at.

Stepford United Football Club.name: Stepford United Football Club
Stepford United Football Club.summary: Stepford United Football Club , or simply Stepford UFC , is a through station and terminus midway through the Whitefield Branch .

Stepford Victoria.name: Stepford Victoria
Stepford Victoria.summary: Stepford Victoria is the terminus of the Stepford Victoria Branch .

Upper Staploe.name: Upper Staploe
Upper Staploe.summary: Upper Staploe is a limited-service through station on the Stepford Main Line that opened in Version 1.7 .

Water Newton.name: Water Newton
Water Newton.summary: Water Newton is a through station on the Stepford Main Line .

West Benton.name: West Benton
West Benton.summary: West Benton is a through station on the Newry Branch .

Westercoast.name: Westercoast
Westercoast.summary: Westercoast is a through station on the Stepford Main Line that opened in Version 1.4 .

Westwyvern.name: Westwyvern
Westwyvern.summary: Westwyvern is a major through station on the Stepford Main Line , with some services terminating here.

Whitefield.name: Whitefield
Whitefield.summary: Whitefield is the terminus of the Whitefield Branch . It is served by Stepford Connect services to Willowfield , Beechley and Stepford Central .
Whitefield.accessibility: Level access & step-free access via ramp

Whitefield Lido.name: Whitefield Lido
Whitefield Lido.summary: Whitefield Lido is an elevated through station on the Whitefield Branch .

Whitney Green.name: Whitney Green
Whitney Green.summary: Whitney Green is a through station on the Greenslade Branch .

Willowfield.name: Willowfield
Willowfield.summary: Willowfield is a terminus on the Willowfield Branch . It provides Stepford Connect services to Whitefield , Port Benton , Westwyvern and Llyn-by-the-Sea ; and Metro services to Stepford Victoria , Stepford United Football Club , Berrily and Barton .

Woodhead Lane.name: Woodhead Lane
Woodhead Lane.summary: Woodhead Lane is a through station located along the Whitefield Branch .
